name: CA Pro Classic Trainers
description: PRODUCT STORY Ever since the original PUMA California was released in the 1980s, it's been making its mark on the streets. A new addition to the footwear family, the CA Pro Classic Trainers feature all the hallmarks of the iconic silhouette, like clean lines, but add perfect perforations and a moulded midsole. Heritage-inspired but perfect for today, these West Coast-inspired trainers make simple look sleek. DETAILS Leather upperRubber midsole and outsoleLace closure for a snug fitDebossed and foil printed PUMA No. 2 Logo at quarterPUMA Formstrip at lateral sidesPUMA branding at heel

name: CA Pro Tumble Trainers
description: PRODUCT STORY A new addition to the iconic California family, the CA Pro adds a stacked midsole with rubber plugs front and back to original elements for a progressive, edgier look. For the Tumble collection, we've added texture to the upper and subtle pops of colour throughout for a fresh summer season vibe. They're the perfect wardrobe refresher. DETAILS Low boot silhouetteSynthetic leather upper with mesh liningRubber midsole with rubber and TPU plugsRubber outsoleLace closure for a snug fitEmbroidered PUMA Formstrip on lateral and medial sidesWoven PUMA Archive No. 1 label on tonguePUMA No. 2 Logo on quarter panelPUMA Cat Logo on heel

name: Speedcat Shield SD Driving Shoes
description: PRODUCT STORY Pick up the pace with the Speedcat Shield Trainers. These classic shoes are infused with true motorsport DNA – they're the perfect trainers for all the motorsport fans out there. DETAILS Low-boot constructionTrue motorsport DNALace closure for a snug fit

name: Speedcat Shield SD Driving Shoes
description: PRODUCT STORY Pick up the pace with the Speedcat Shield Trainers. These classic shoes are infused with true motorsport DNA – they're the perfect trainers for all the motorsport fans out there. DETAILS Low-boot constructionTrue motorsport DNALace closure for a snug fit

name: PWRFRAME OP-1 GTX Trainers
description: PRODUCT STORY Supercharge your stride with our PWRFRAME OP-1 GTX Trainers. This innovative shoe pairs a futuristic silhouette with our PWRFRAME technology to deliver a supremely supportive midsole with a continuous ring of form for optimal comfort and rebound. The rugged design is built for durability and uses waterproof GORE-TEX technology to give you all-season performance no matter what the weather throws at you. FEATURES & BENEFITS CMEVA: PUMA's compression-moulded EVA material for lightweight performance DETAILS Ballistic nylon upper with leather overlaysCMEVA midsoleRubber outsoleLace closureRipstop tongue with synthetic leather overlay and 3D printed PUMA Cat LogoLeather overlays on toe, heel and eyestaySynthetic leather heel label with 3D printed PUMA brandingGORE-TEX ribbon accent on tongueGORE-TEX logo at sidePUMA Formstrip at side

name: Future Rider Tech Sneakers
description: PRODUCT STORY Born in 1980, the Fast Rider launched as running started to move from the track to the streets. Designed for more unpredictable terrain, the shoe featured an ultra-light upper and our supreme shock-absorbing Federbein outsole. In 2022, the archival version is back… this time as the Future Rider. Sleek and streamlined, with a nylon upper, suede and synthetic overlays, and bold PUMA branding, this pair ​pops off the pavement. DETAILS Nylon upper with suede and synthetic overlaysMesh interior liningPUMA Formstrip with nylon webbingPUMA branding

name: Suede GORE-TEX Trainers
description: PRODUCT STORY The Suede is a footwear legacy that has been evolving since the late 1960s. It's been worn and loved by every generation for the past five decades – and won't be stopping there. This edition unites classic Suede style with GORE-TEX technology, so you can take on the world, whatever the weather. The waterproof GORE-TEX upper will keep your feet warm and dry, whether you're tackling a mountain hike or simply exploring the city streets. A traditional Suede silhouette and branding details give a streetstyle finish to this high-performance shoe. DETAILS Low bootWaterproof suede upperMesh liningRubber midsoleRubber outsoleWaterproof textile tongueLace closureWaterproof leather PUMA Formstrip at lateral sidePUMA print and GORE-TEX label at tongueDebossed and printed GORE-TEX branding at lateral heel

A new addition to the footwear family, the CA Pro Heritage Trainers feature all the hallmarks of the iconic silhouette, like clean lines and luxurious leather, but add perfect perforations, a moulded midsole and pops of colour for standout appeal. Retro-inspired but perfect for today, these West Coast-inspired trainers make simple look sleek. name: City Rider Ripstop Trainers
description: PRODUCT STORY The silver painting on the midsole of these trendy trainers is designed to ensure you're seen. But the other design elements here also make sure these trainers won't go unnoticed. Like the ripstop upper with its soft PU-coated overlays and the bold leather PUMA Formstrip with its nylon piping. And, of course, that all sits atop the unmistakable and iconic Rider outsole. FEATURES & BENEFITS IMEVA: PUMA's material for a lightweight and comfortable feel DETAILS Low bootRipstop and nylon upperIMEVA midsoleRubber outsoleSoft PU-coated overlays on toe and heelNylon tongue with silver reflective synthetic tongue labelSynthetic leather PUMA Formstrip with nylon pipingPUMA Wordmark on tongue and outsole

name: Suede VTG GTX Trainers
description: PRODUCT STORY Since hitting the scene in 1968, the Suede collection has been changing the game – it has been worn by the icons of every generation. And these trainers, designed with Gore-Tex, are no exception. Keeping the design as close as possible to the iconic original, these trainers boast GUARANTEED TO KEEP YOU DRY™ protection, and are made for all-day long, all-year long comfort. There's a waterproof suede upper, a nubuck PUMA Formstrip, eyestay and heel and striking PUMA Cat Logos and Gore-Tex labels on the tongue and heel. DETAILS Low bootWaterproof suede upperRubber midsoleRubber outsoleNylon tongue with PUMA Logo and reflective GORE-TEX labelNubuck PUMA Formstrip, eyestay and heelPrint+ debossed GORE-TEX label on side heelPrint and embossed PUMA Cat Logo on heel

name: Wild Rider Rollin' Sneakers
description: PRODUCT STORY Go with the flow and roll with the punches. The Wild Rider Rollin' will sweep you up into the next season of urban streetstyle, with vibrant pops of colour and a dynamic silhouette. Taking inspiration from youth culture, this next-generation shoe combines athletic chic with edgy elements for a fresh, invigorating look. name: Jamming 2.0 Men's Running Shoes
description: PRODUCT STORY Avant-garde design meets advanced technology in these visually striking, high-performance running shoes from the Jamming family. A midsole packed with mini beads in a soft-touch shell combines ultimate cushioning with aesthetic interest, while an exaggerated clamshell collar makes for easy on and off and creates a dynamic, contemporary silhouette. DETAILS Low bootClamshell collar construction for ease of entry and enhanced fitTPU cageMidsole made with comfortable beads enclosed in a soft-touch casingPUMA Formstrip at lateral sidePUMA Cat Logo at tongue

name: RS-Fast Neon Trainers
description: PRODUCT STORY Say hello to the updated RS-Fast Neon, part of our expanding RS family. The upper is sleeker and features new PUMA Cat Logo branding, and we've updated the midsole pods and added a TPU heel piece for additional support and stability. With PUMA's Running System under the bonnet, you can be sure of all-day cushioned comfort. FEATURES & BENEFITS Running System: PUMA's comfortable cushioning technology celebrates the reinvention of a unique moment and movement in culture DETAILS Bulky silhouetteMesh upper with leather overlaysRS technology on midsoleRubber outsoleLace closure for a snug fitThermoplastic polyurethane heel pieceNeon detailingPUMA Formstrip on lateral side

name: Classics Halterneck Top Women by Pedroche
description: PRODUCT STORY Simple and sleek – that’s what our Classics are all about, and this halterneck top is no exception. The pared back construction makes it a perfect complement to just about any wardrobe in your closet. DETAILS Halter neckSleevelessPUMA brandingTight fit

description: PRODUCT STORY The Cruise Rider is a bolder-than-bold addition to the Rider family. Its upper stays true to the Rider lineage, with a mixture of materials and overlays giving a retro running look, but the chunky sole and TPU clip give it a heavy dose of attitude for the modern day. DETAILS Mesh upper with leather overlaysTPU clipIMEVA midsoleRubber outsoleSynthetic leather PUMA Formstrip on the side

name: Classics Short Tights Women by Pedroche
description: PRODUCT STORY Simple and sleek – that’s what our Classics are all about, and these short tights are no exception. With a pared back design, it is a perfect accoutrement to just about any wardrobe – whether you're feeling sporty or ready to hit the city. DETAILS Above knee lengthPUMA brandingTight fit

name: Classics Ribbed Women's Tee by Pedroche
description: PRODUCT STORY We collected our most beloved designs for our Classics collection, featuring modern accessories with unparalleled style and unprecedented function. Our Classics Ribbed Tee is a charming addition to any wardrobe, featuring a cropped hemline, ribbed body for textural interest, colour-contrasting accents and recycled materials for a flirty, eco-friendly staple. FEATURES & BENEFITS Contains Recycled Material: Made with recycled fibers. One of PUMA's answers to reduce our environmental impact. DETAILS Slim fitCrew neckHem with external drawcords for flattering look and customised fitPUMA Archive No. 1 Logo woven embroidery at chest
